Job Title: Security Specialist

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: physical security, emergency response, defensive tactics, arresting techniques, tactical firearms, basic IT troubleshooting, EMT, Paramedic, CPR/First Aid

Description:
GDBA is actively hiring Protective Security Personnel in all locations across the US. With more than 86 new positions available, there is no better time than now to join the growing and rewarding profession of Public Figure Protection.*

Gavin de Becker & Associates (GDBA) protects the worlds most influential and at-risk public figures. Founded in 1978 by 3-time Presidential appointee, Gavin de Becker, our firm’s Protectors, Analysts, and Investigators are committed to our mission of protecting human life through the assessment, prediction, and management of violence.

Learn more about our organization on our website or our LinkedIn page.

 First year earnings range from $65k to $90k based on a 40-hour work week. Additional overtime opportunities, bonuses, and travel pay are also available. Visit our Earnings & Benefits Page to learn more. **

================================================================================

Mission

The safety, privacy and wellbeing of our Clients.

Who You Are

Military, law enforcement, or security background is great, though not a requirement. We’re less interested in what you are than?who you are. ?Our most successful protectors come from a variety of backgrounds and have succeeded because they are willing to learn, work hard, tell the truth, and flat out perform. Our promotion system is merit-based. Performance matters most, not seniority.

Minimum Requirements

Wish to be of service and protect othersExcellent communication abilityCommitment to maintaining high level of attentiveness and energyExcellent health and fitness, able to pass physical readiness testCan pass a pre-employment background investigationDrug and nicotine-freeAble to obtain a state firearms licensePossess a high school diploma, GED, or equivalent

Valuable Qualifications (though Not Required)

Previous security experience, including remote monitoring, access control, physical security or emergency responseEmergency medical training or certification (e.g. EMT, Paramedic, CPR/First Aid)Prior training in defensive tactics, arresting techniques or tactical firearmsWorking knowledge of basic IT troubleshooting

Note: We are also hiring for an Executive Protection Team Leader, view the job posting here.

Additional Benefits

Highest Standard of Quality and Resources in the Industry12-Day Introductory Training Academy, plus continual training and qualificationsMedical, Dental, Vision, and Life Insurance, 401kGym, Massage, Ammunition and Cellphone Reimbursement View our Earnings and Benefits Page for additional information

Locations: Please search on redballoon.work for the company: 'Gavin de Becker' and the location you are interested in and submit an application from that link so you can be considered for the location you are interested in.
